item.title: How to Incorporate Tallow Balm Into Your Skincare Routine
item.description: How to Incorporate Tallow Balm Into Your Skincare Routine If you’re looking for a simple, effective skincare routine, tallow balm NZ is the perfect addition. It’s packed with skin-loving fats and vitamins that deeply nourish without needing extra products. 1. Morning Routine: Lock in Moisture & Protect ✔ Cleanse – Use a gentle cleanser or tallow balm as a cleanser. ✔ Apply tallow balm – Use a pea-sized amount and warm it in your hands before pressing it into your skin.
